member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator
member.summary: The class overriding FileCabinetService.ValidateParameters method.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.ValidateParameters(FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord)
member.summary: Validates the parameters.
member.param: The record to check its data.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.CheckNames(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates the first and the last names.
member.exception: Thrown when one of the names is null.
Thrown when one of the names is shorter than 2 symbols. Also thrown when the name consists of only whitespaces.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.CheckDateOfBirth(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Validates the date of birth.
member.exception: Thrown when the dae is less than 1900-Jan-1 or more than today's date.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.CheckWorkExperience(System.Int16,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Validates the work experience.
member.exception: Thrown when the work experience more than persons age - 16.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.CheckBalance(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Validates the balance.
member.exception: Thrown when balence is less than 0.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.CheckFavLetter(System.Char)
member.summary: Validates the favorite letter.
member.exception: Thrown when char is not a letter.
